Accused_Victim_names.Complainant_Victim: XYZ (Age 28, S/o ABC, R/o DEF, P.S. GHI, Dist JKL)

Output_A.Incident_facts: On 12/07/2020, complainant XYZ discovered a theft at his mobile shop 'Maa Saraswati Telecom' located at LC 14 Railway Gate, near ZZ Bazaar. He had closed the shop at 8 PM the previous night (11/07/2020) and found it ransacked when he opened it at 9 AM on 12/07/2020. Entry was gained by opening the asbestos sheet of the roof. Stolen items include Rs. 8000 cash, two new mobile phones (with specified IMEI numbers), and five old mobile phones given by customers for repair.
